body:
Please nominate projects that could become priorities for the next ~6 months (until the 27.0 release). We (frequent contributors) will vote on which projects will be priorities next week in a separate issue.

Project priorities are those which the frequent contributors to this project have voted on to have more focused review on for the next ~6 months. This issue is to list what projects are ongoing that can be voted on. Voting will occur in a separate issue that will be opened next week.

Nominations will close at the start of the IRC meeting on October 12th at 14:00 UTC. The issue for voting will be opened at that time as well.

Nominations and voting is limited to those who are part of the bitcoin github organization. Comments in this issue from those outside of the organization will be ignored, and may be deleted. If you are not part of the organization and believe that you should be, please send me an email or message me on IRC.

Initial list from recent CoreDev:

* Multiprocess
* Silent payments #28536
* Package Relay #27463
* Legacy wallet (BDB) removal #20160
* Erlay
* Cmake
* Kernel
* Logging Migration
* Stratum V2
* Cluster mempool

AssumeUTXO and BIP 324 were on this list originally, but they seem to be done now?
title: Gathering Priorities for 27.0
